/b.js(2,16): error TS8011: Type arguments can only be used in TypeScript files.


==== /a.d.ts (0 errors) ====
    declare class A<T> { x: T }
    
==== /b.js (1 errors) ====
    /** @augments A<number> */
    class B extends A {
                   ~~
!!! error TS8011: Type arguments can only be used in TypeScript files.
        m() {
            return this.x;
        }
    }
